content: k32 38 80 pm knit to end sock/sport k38 46 98 pm knit to end markers now separate the garter stitch and stockinette stitch sections round 1 purl to marker sm knit to end round 2 knit work rounds 1-2 until piece measures 5 8 5 8 5 from cast-on measured at the stockinette side of the work change to smaller needles work in 1x1 rib k1 p1 for 1 1 5 1 5 loosely bind off all sts oats cowl facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com 3 tin can knits popular patterns ♥ excellent support sign up for our emails and be sure to send us a note about what you d like to learn next facebook-square instagram ravelry pinterest envelope www tincanknits com
